title.narrative: Strengthening the RE Policy and Regulatory Framework (FOMPIER) Phase II

description.narrative: The objective of this Technical Cooperation (TC) is to support the Government of Honduras in the analysis and update of the investments required to carry out the National Reinforcements in Honduras to enhance it energy marketability in the Regional Electricity Market – MER and, to supervise the implementation of the operation.

participating-org.narrative: Inter-American Development Bank, Inter-American Investment Corporation and Multilateral Investment Fund

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
